Title: AVP/SENIOR ASSOCIATE
Expectations: Takes ownership of decisions for the workstream.

Title: AVP/SENIOR ASSOCIATE
Expectations: Executes day-to-day oversight of the strategy implementation.

Title: AVP/SENIOR ASSOCIATE
Expectations: Impact or value-add is primarily due to management of cross-functional team vendor relationships budgets or operations or level of technical input.

Title: AVP/SENIOR ASSOCIATE
Expectations: Leads small to medium scale initiatives/projects with business area-wide impact through subject matter expertise.

Title: AVP/SENIOR ASSOCIATE
Expectations: Capable of overseeing more than one initiative/project at a time.

Title: AVP/SENIOR ASSOCIATE
Expectations: Demonstrates resilience and emotional maturity under stress.

Title: AVP/SENIOR ASSOCIATE
Expectations: Helps colleagues accurately assess their strengths and areas for improvement.

Title: AVP/SENIOR ASSOCIATE
Expectations: Effectively prioritizes efforts across multiple projects to produce high quality deliverables on-time and shares best practices with junior team members.

Title: AVP/SENIOR ASSOCIATE
Expectations: Solicits and acts upon feedback from colleagues to improve own and the team's performance.

Title: AVP/SENIOR ASSOCIATE
Expectations: Oversees team’s work products and provides timely positive and constructive feedback.

Title: AVP/SENIOR ASSOCIATE
Expectations: Presents complex topics in a straightforward and concise way.

Title: AVP/SENIOR ASSOCIATE
Expectations: Helps junior team members develop and effectively communicate their point of view.

Title: AVP/SENIOR ASSOCIATE
Expectations: Possesses deep technical knowledge in business area.

Title: AVP/SENIOR ASSOCIATE
Expectations: Serves as subject matter expert representing business area for cross-functional/firmwide initiatives.

Title: AVP/SENIOR ASSOCIATE
Expectations: Understands and effectively communicates business area's goals and aligns own and team’s priorities to ensure goals are achieved.

Title: AVP/SENIOR ASSOCIATE
Expectations: Supports and advocates for the team even when new ideas do not result in desired outcomes.

Title: AVP/SENIOR ASSOCIATE
Expectations: Effectively manages senior stakeholder relationships.

Title: AVP/SENIOR ASSOCIATE
Expectations: Opens internal and external networks to help junior team members build relationships.

Title: AVP/SENIOR ASSOCIATE
Expectations: Encourages the team to help other groups when asked even though there may not be a tangible benefit.

Title: AVP/SENIOR ASSOCIATE
Expectations: Leverages best practices to help the team identify and solve problems while implementing change.

Title: AVP/SENIOR ASSOCIATE
Expectations: Takes the initiative to anticipate and mitigate risk and knows when to escalate issues/risks to senior team members.

Title: AVP/SENIOR ASSOCIATE
Expectations: Shares best practices with team to mitigate unconscious bias in decision making and how we engage with people.

Title: AVP/SENIOR ASSOCIATE
Expectations: Expanding professional internal/external networks to include a wide array of diverse professionals.

Title: AVP/SENIOR ASSOCIATE
Expectations: Models inclusive behaviors and encourages colleague to share diverse perspectives.
